secondaries.shortDescription: Kill more enemy units in melee than grechin units get killed (3pts), +1 pts if at least 2 units killed it doubles the number of killed gretchin units

subObjectives.description: Killed more enemy units in melee than grechin units got killed in melee
Killed at least 2 enemy units in melee and doubled the gretchin units got killed in melee

secondaries.shortDescription: Pick up to 3 Good Bitz objectives out of deployments. Action from 1+ Orc Core units: completed on command phase in different Good Bitz objectives. (3pts)

subObjectives.description: Completed action in a different Good Bits (out of deployment) objective marker

secondaries.shortDescription: 3 pts each time your warlord kill in melee(cap 5pts per round): monster, vehicle, character, 5 enemy models

subObjectives.description: Killed VEHICLE or MONSTER in melee by your warlord
Killed CHARACTER in melee by your warlord
Killed 5 models in melee by your warlord

secondaries.shortDescription: Divide the board in 4 equals parts. Have units of 11 or more models on them. 2+ quarters (3pts), 4 quarters (5pts)

subObjectives.description: 2 or more quarters have units of 11 models or more (end of round)
2 or more quarters have units of 11 models or more (end of game)
